actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase rates of disability compensation and dependency and indemnity compensation, and to provide for automatic adjustment thereof commensurate with future increases in the cost of living.

summary.text: Provides a 12-percent increase in veterans' compensation benefits and a 14-percent increase in dependency and indemnity compensation benefits. Provides for an automatic adjustment of disability compensation with increases in the cost of living.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase rates of disability compensation and dependency and indemnity compensation, and to provide for automatic adjustment thereof commensurate with future increases in the cost of living.
